hover.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if a bird, insect, or helicopter hovers, it stays in one place in the air
hover.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: flies hovering above the surface of the water
hover.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to stay nervously in the same place, especially because you are waiting for something or are not certain what to do
hover.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Her younger brother hovered in the background watching us.
I noticed several reporters hovering around outside the courtroom.
hover.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: if a level, price etc hovers around a certain amount, it stays close to that amount, only changing slightly up or down
hover.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: The dollar has been hovering around the 110 yen level.
hover.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: to put the cursor on something on a computer screen, using the mouse
hover.translation[0].definitions[3].exam: When you hover the cursor over the image, the title of the image appears.
